name: AI-Based Weather Modeling for Weather Accelerator
desc: Developed an AI-based weather prediction and simulation model using historical data to automate accelerated weathering control on Jetson Nano.

name: Fafnir
desc: AI-assisted board-game learning system integrating FSM, game theory, and autonomous AI agents.

name: Fafnir V.2
desc: Web-based real-time board game with online multiplayer, hybrid AI (Q-learning + heuristics), and detailed game-state synchronization.

name: Room volume measurement device using ultrasonic sensors
desc: A portable device capable of measuring room volume using ultrasonic sensors integrated with an Arduino board.
